basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, flowering period March-May, fruiting period October-November in the next year
basic.color: Leaf color green , fruit color brown, purple blue, black

maintenance.soil: Calcareous soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead, rotten, diseased leaves and the parts that may affect the good appearance
